item.title: The Dollar Value of a Human Life
item.description: Spoiler…it’s $10 million USD. I heard a fascinating podcast episode from Planet Money titled “Lives Vs. The Economy” recently, and it blew my mind. It addressed the question that has been asked more and more recently in the public discourse: “is it ever worth it to shut down the economy to save lives?”, or in other words, “Why can’t we open back up? I need to go back to work!
